overview: The movie centers on a piano competition whose winner is assured of success. It is Paul's last chance to compete, but newcomer Heidi may be a better pianist. Can romance be far away? Will she take a dive despite the pressure to win from her teacher, Greta, or will she condemn Paul to obscurity?
tagline: If you're really in love... nothing's going to stand in your way
cast: Richard Dreyfuss|Amy Irving|Lee Remick|Sam Wanamaker|Joseph Cali
